text: @SupraDarky He also did the soundtrack to "Border Down" (Dreamcast, 2003)...awesome!!
author: Peter Fernandes

text: I love the style Watanabe went with for this series' music; very unique with a full sound. I think only the first game came out of Japan (titled WarTech here). Anyways, as I said on twitter, I'll be posting my Top 10 games of 2013 after Best VGM 1500. It was a good gaming year!
author: SupraDarky

text:
"It was a good gaming year!"

Pretty sure people say that every year.
author: Matrilwood

text: @Matrilwood Ha. Yes but it's mostly true anyways, gaming has pretty much steadily increased since what 1978? And the best is still yet to come!
author: xSayPleasex

text:
@xSayPleasex
It has it's ups and downs. I think the industry is only starting to fully recover from the 2008 Economic Breakdown.
author: Matrilwood

text: I agree, this style is great~
author: Sayeth Di Puppeth

text: +Matrilwood The industry keeps getting better and better. I don't care what people say about E3 and who "won it." The answer is us. We, the people of the gaming community, win.
author: Moop Bread
